About Us

About Us

Who We Are

Hi! We are Michael and Audrey. Thanks for visiting our site. We started HotSpringing.com to help people take some of the unpredictability out of hot springing. Who, what, when, and where, were all questions we had before we started this adventure in exploring the dozens of hot springs in our backyard. We hope to help answer those questions for you here before your first dip, next dip, or hundredth dip. Thanks for taking the plunge with us, the water's warm!

Our Story

It all began when Michael and Audrey fist started dating. Michael was an Idaho native who was an outdoor enthusiast and Audrey was a Dallas native who considered dining on a patio to be "outdoorsey." Michael spent countless weekends encouraging Audrey to become an Idahoan by snow shoeing, hiking, camping, and even fishing when he realized that nothing made her happier than soaking in a bathtub (with a glass of wine). Right then he decided to combine their two favorite past times and introduced her to hot springing. It was perfect. Audrey was now hot tubing with an amazing view and Michael was exploring to find the next best spring.The two became weekend warriors and began keeping a hot spring log in a notebook they kept in their car. Their notebook is what you see today. Michael's background in web development and Audrey's ongoing notebook notes are now HotSpringing.com.

Contact Us

We would love to hear from you! Don't hesitate to shoot us an email at contact@hotspringing.com or send us a message through Instagram or Facebook to answer any questions, listen to ideas and suggestions, and do what we can to make your hot springing experience the best it can be!


We look forward to connecting with you.
